name: quartile

one of four equal measurements that a set of things can be divided into: He is in the top quartile for weight. Compare
quintile

GRAPHS & CHARTS in statistics , one of four equal parts that a set of figures is divided into, in order of size, amount, value, etc.: in the top/second, etc. quartile The investment fund has appeared regularly in the top quartile of performance tables.
